deity.name: None
deity.description: Due to closed content PCGEN cannot provide a list of deities, sorry but you need to homebrew your own list; Please see the Documentation for how to do so - http://www.pcgen-test.org/autobuilds/pcgen-docs/listfilepages/lstfileclass/lfc_lesson14_deities.html
deity.domainlist: Air, Animal, Chaos, Death, Destruction, Earth, Evil, Fire, Good, Healing, Knowledge, Law, Luck, Magic, Plant, Protection, Strength, Sun, Travel, Trickery, War, Water
deity.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdbasiccharacterclassesi

skills.list_mods: Climb +4, Craft (Calligraphy) +5, Craft (Leatherworking) +5, Hide +5, Jump +2, Listen +3, Move Silently +3

feat.name: Blind-Fight
feat.description: In melee, every time a character misses because of concealment, the character can reroll the miss chance percentile roll one time to see if the character actually hit.

feat.name: Scribe Scroll
feat.description: The character can create a scroll of any spell that the character knows.

ability_object.name: +1 racial bonus on all saving throws.
ability_object.description: +1 racial bonus on all saving throws.

ability_object.name: +1 racial bonus on attack rolls with thrown weapons and slings.
ability_object.description: +1 racial bonus on attack rolls with thrown weapons and slings.

ability_object.name: +2 morale bonus on saving throws against fear
ability_object.description: +2 morale bonus on saving throws against fear

ability_object.name: +2 racial bonus on Climb, Jump, and Move Silently checks.
ability_object.description: +2 racial bonus on Climb, Jump, and Move Silently checks.

description.para: +2 racial bonus on Climb, Jump, and Move Silently checks.
+1 racial bonus on all saving throws.
+2 morale bonus on saving throws against fear
+1 racial bonus on attack rolls with thrown weapons and slings.

character.weapon_proficiencies: Club, Crossbow (Heavy), Crossbow (Light), Dagger, Gauntlet, Grapple, Quarterstaff, Spells(Ray), Unarmed Strike

spell.name: Arcane Mark
spell.effect: Inscribes a personal rune [visible or invisible].
spell.target: One personal rune or mark, all of which must fit within 1 ft. square

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsa

spell.description: Inscribes a personal rune (visible or invisible).

spell.name: Dancing Lights
spell.target: Up to four illusionary lights, all within a 10-ft.-radius area

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsd

spell.name: Detect Magic
spell.effect: Detects spells and magic items within 60 ft.
spell.target: Quarter circle emanating from the character to the extreme of the range

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsd

spell.description: Detects spells and magic items within 60 ft.

spell.name: Detect Poison
spell.effect: Detects poison in one creature or small object.
spell.target: One creature, one object, or a 5-ft. cube

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsd

spell.description: Detects poison in one creature or small object.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsd
Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsf
Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsjkl

spell.name: Mage Hand
spell.target: Nonmagical, unattended object weighing up to 5 lb.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsm

spell.name: Mending
spell.effect: Makes minor repairs on an object.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsm

spell.description: Makes minor repairs on an object.

spell.name: Open/Close
spell.effect: Opens or closes small or light things.
spell.target: Portal or object that can be opened or closed

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsno

spell.description: Opens or closes small or light things.

spell.name: Chill Touch
spell.effect: 1 touches deal 1d6 damage and possibly 1 Str damage.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsc

spell.description: (CASTERLEVEL) touches deal 1d6 damage and possibly 1 Str damage.

spell.name: Comprehend Languages
spell.effect: Understands all spoken and written languages.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsc

spell.description: Understands all spoken and written languages.

spell.name: Detect Secret Doors
spell.target: Quarter circle emanating from the character to the extreme of the range

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsd

spell.name: Detect Undead
spell.target: Quarter circle emanating from the character to the extreme of the range
